title: Immune Boost Essential Oil Blend | barefut Essential Oils | 100% Pure
author: Var Ans Customer Id
description: Immune Boost Essential Oil Blend contains Frankincense, Rosemary, Tea Tree, Lemon, Sweet Orange & Eucalyptus to help boost your immune system this winter!
cleaned_text: Description 100% Pure Therapeutic Immune Boost Essential Oil Blend Unadulterated (undiluted/unchanged) Naturally support & strengthen your immune system with Bareft's blend of 100% Pure Essential Oils. Add to a carrier oil and apply topically, or use this blend in your diffuser. Ingredients: Frankincense, Tea Tree, Rosemary, Lemon, Eucalyptus, and Sweet Orange Directions: Add to your diffuser for aromatherapy benefits. Recommended to properly blend with a carrier oil prior to topical applications. Cautions: Possible skin sensitivity. Keep out of reach of children. If pregnant or under a doctor's care, consult your physician. Disclaimer: These statements and products have not been evaluated by United States Food and Drug Administration and are not approved to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent disease. The information given is not intended as a substitute for advice from your physician or other health care professional.
